channel.title: No icon for a desktop shortcut?? NO WAY!
channel.description:
A mod like this DESERVES an actual icon. (well it already has, but sometimes it does not appear when building the shortcut from Steam) Here, from the original setup executable: [url]https://www.mediafire.com/?85fwcnawbqlok1y[/url] ![](upload://cQYABF7pY9d0KLjCGaXZlCC0bRY.png)
N.B.: If you don't know how to apply it to a shortcut, just open its properties and select "change icon" or whatever it is, then select the icon from where you placed its download :wink:

item.title: No icon for a desktop shortcut?? NO WAY!
item.dc:creator: Banderi
item.description:
You’re welcome!
I’ve got Win7 Pro 64bit xL

Read full topic

item.title: No icon for a desktop shortcut?? NO WAY!
item.dc:creator: gibmonkey
item.description:
Banderi:

I did, but it made a blank shortcut… must be a minor bug xD

I had the same thing. Uninstalled and reinstalled. Tried running install as Admin. 64 bit Windows 8 Release Candidate. Thank you for this!
